Guns.Name: Knife
Guns.Description:
A melee weapon. This weapon is used automatically. Simply walk into and an enemy to slash and cause damage. You will also damage objects when you walk into them, unless they are explosives. Using the attack key just makes you hold your position.

Damage: 2
Attack rate: 420 slashes/minute
Cost: 0

Guns.Name: Fists
Guns.Description: A melee weapon of last resort

Guns.Name: Machine gun
Guns.Description:
A rapidly firing bullet hose. Its bullets have a medium range, and the gun has a slight spread.

Damage: 10
Rate of fire: 700 round/min
Lifespan: 0.85s
Speed: 768
Cost: 1

Guns.Name: Grenades
Guns.Description:
Throw timed grenades which will bounce off the ground, walls and enemies. Each grenade causes a big explosion after the end of its lifespan. It is very damaging to anyone caught by it - including the thrower! Grenades are quite expensive, so use sparingly if you aim for a high score.

Damage: Large explosion
Rate of fire: 140 round/min
Range: Medium
Lifespan: 1.42s
Speed: 384
Cost: 20

Guns.Name: Flamer
Guns.Description:
This short-range tactical flamethrower releases flames which burn enemies, causing high damage. The flames can also be reflected by walls. The flamer can be a deadly weapon when used by a skilled close quarters fighter.

Damage: 12
Rate of fire: 700 round/min
Lifespan: 0.42s
Speed: 1024
Cost: 1

Guns.Name: Shotgun
Guns.Description:
The shotgun is slow and only has a short range, but it fires 5 bullets per shot in a large spread. The shotgun is most effective in close quarters combat but difficult to use in long range.

Damage: 15 per bullet (max. 75)
Rate of fire: 84 round/min
Lifespan: 0.71s
Speed: 640
Cost: 5

Guns.Name: Powergun
Guns.Description:
This futuristic gun fires very fast and long range energy lasers. The powergun always fires in a perfectly straight line.

Damage: 20
Rate of fire: 210 round/min
Lifespan: 1.28s
Speed: 768
Cost: 2

Guns.Name: Shrapnel bombs
Guns.Description:
A throwable timed weapon which bounces around for a while. When its lifespan is over, the shrapnel bomb will release 16 dangerous bullets in a circle pattern.

Damage: 40 per bullet (max. 640)
Rate of fire: 140 round/min
Range of bomb: Medium
Lifespan of bomb: 1.42s
Speed of bomb: 384
Cost: 20

Guns.Name: Molotovs
Guns.Description:
A throwable weapon which will burst into fire when it hits the ground, at wall or an enemy. The flames are very hot, so use the molotovs with care!

Damage: Fire
Rate of fire: 140 round/min
Range: Short
Speed: 384
Cost: 20

Guns.Name: Sniper rifle
Guns.Description:
A tactical weapon which fires a strong long-range projectile which makes 50 damage on a hit. Its reload time is rather long. The sniper rifle always fires in a perfecly straight line.

Damage: 50
Rate of fire: 42 round/min
Lifespan: 0.42s
Speed: 1024
Cost: 5

Guns.Name: Prox. mine
Guns.Description:
Proximity mine. You will place a mine on the ground which will become active after 2 seconds. When the mine is active, it will explode as soon as any player (including the placer) is careless enough to walk in proximity to it. So don't wait for too long after you placed a mine.

Damage: Large explosion
Rate of fire: 42 round/min
Cost: 10

Guns.Name: Dynamite
Guns.Description:
You will light and place a stick of dynamite on the ground, which will burst in a large explosion after 3 seconds.

Damage: Large explosion
Rate of fire: 42 round/min
Lifespan: 3.00s
Cost: 7

Guns.Name: Chemo bombs
Guns.Description:
A bouncing grenade that bursts into a cloud of poison gas. Poisoned players lose health constantly for a while.

Damage: Poison
Rate of fire: 140 round/min
Range: Medium
Lifespan: 1.42s
Speed: 384
Cost: 7

Guns.Name: Petrify gun
Guns.Description:
This gun fires projectiles that turn enemies into stone for short time, making them unable to walk and shoot. This gun has no spread.

Damage: 0
Rate of fire: 42 round/min
Lifespan: 0.64s
Speed: 768
Cost: 10

Guns.Name: Browny gun
Guns.Description:
A weapon of alien origins. As soon as you pull the trigger, a projectile will be released which will take a completely unpredictable path. Hitting something with this strange gun is largely luck-based. It is more likely to hit something when the browny gun is used in close quarters combat.

Damage: 15
Rate of fire: 140 round/min
Lifespan: 0.64s
Speed: 768
Cost: 5

Guns.Name: Confusion bombs
Guns.Description:
A throwable weapon which bounces and bursts in a cloud of confusion gas after its lifespan. Players affected by confusion gas walk in the opposite direction they intended to and the effect wears off after a while.

Damage: 0
Rate of fire: 140 round/min
Range: Medium
Lifespan: 1.42s
Speed: 384
Cost: 10

Guns.Name: Chemo gun
Guns.Description:
This weapon releases a short line of poison gas clouds. Players which walk into poison clouds will be poisoned and start to constantly health for a short time.

Damage: Poison
Rate of fire: 700 round/min
Lifespan: 0.5s
Speed: 384
Cost: 1

Guns.Name: Pulse rifle
Guns.Description:
The pulse rifle fires pulse balls with a stunningly high rate of fire, but in a rather short range and also with a large spread.

Damage: 6
Rate of fire: 1050 round/min
Lifespan: 0.35s
Speed: 1280
Cost: 1

Guns.Name: Heatseeker
Guns.Description:
This is a rocket launcher which fires a slow heat-seeking rocket which will follow nearby enemies. The rocket can't make turns very quickly and may easily miss a target, so you still have to aim.

Damage: 20
Rate of fire: 140 round/min
Lifespan: 0.85s
Speed: 512
Cost: 7

Guns.Name: Swarmer
Guns.Description:
The swarmer fires four fast heat-seeking rockets in one shot. They will follow enemies and cause direct damage on impact. The rockets are able to turn around quickly which may make it easier to hit targets.

Damage: 12 per rocket (max. 48)
Rate of fire: 70 round/min
Lifespan: 1.00s
Speed: 700
Cost: 15

Guns.Name: Launcher
Guns.Description:
A rocket launcher. It fires a single rocket which is slow at the beginning but it will accellerate rapidly. The rocket causes a small but highly damaging explosion on impact.

Damage: Small explosion
Rate of fire: 60 round/min
Lifespan: 1.71s
Initial speed: 120 (rocket will accellerate)
Cost: 15

Guns.Name: Pistol
Guns.Description:
A short range, medium rate of fire weapon, the pistol has fast moving bullets for hit-and-run tactics.
Its 0-cost-per-shot makes this a versatile yet economical weapon, great for picking off lone targets.

Damage: 12
Rate of fire: 232 round/min
Lifespan: 0.38s
Speed: 1100
Cost: 0
